item.title: Dissecting a Two-Stage Indian Banking Trojan: From Fake eChallan to Full Device Compromise
item.description: Deep-dive analysis of a fresh Android banking trojan disguised as an Indian RTO eChallan app. Two-stage dropper + payload architecture using NP Protect packer, Firebase C2, SMS interception, USSD abuse, and a 7-page phishing funnel stealing Aadhaar, PAN, card details, and UPI PINs. Only 11/66 VirusTotal detection rate.
